measure.CatchLine: Directs the Department of Consumer and Business Services to establish a program to register all dwelling units that are rented or available for rent.
measure.MeasureSummary:
Digest: The Act tells DCBS to make a program to register rental units. (Flesch Readability Score: 67.7). 
	Directs the Department of Consumer and Business Services to establish a program to register all dwelling units that are rented or available for rent. Allows the department to impose a civil penalty for failure to register a dwelling unit. Provides that specified entities that own in excess of a certain number of dwelling units are subject to an additional fee.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to housing; and providing for revenue raising that requires approval by a three-fifths majority.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to housing; providing for revenue raising that requires approval by a three-fifths majority.
measure.FiscalImpact: May have fiscal impact, but no statement yet issued
measure.RevenueImpact: May have revenue impact, but no statement yet issued

historyActions.ActionText: First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
Referred to Housing and Homelessness with subsequent referral to Revenue.
